description: Records sample collection details for one or more containers and publishes recipe variables with information about the collected samples.
intent: Capture and record sample information including sample identifiers, container counts, quantities, and unit of measure for a specified sample group.

outputs.SampleID: Unique identifier for the collected sample
outputs.UOM: Unit of measure for the collected quantity
outputs.LotID: Lot identifier of the sampled material
outputs.dtContainers: DataTable with columns CONTAINER_NUM, QUANTITY, UOM for each container

postconditions: Recipe variables for sample collection are published and available for downstream phases
example_usage: Operator selects a sample group, specifies number of containers and quantity per container, collects the sample, and upon completion the phase outputs variables like SampleID, NumOfContainers and dtContainers for further processing.
